p: A modified Schaal oven test (accelerated storage test) was used to measure the oxidative stability of fat at 60°C ( Warner et al., 1989). Briefly, the extracted fat samples (1 kg) were poured into glass beakers and placed in a drying oven (SW-90D, Sangwoo Scientific Co., Korea) which was set to 60±2°C for 90 days. Experimental analyses were performed within a 10-day interval.
